creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. J. Peter Ritten
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

Engraved on front about the spigot with an unidentified coat of arms and with a crest on the upper part of the base.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on interior of base and on lower body bezel.  Maker's mark and lion passant on bezel of cover.
title: Tea urn
